definitions: a ship designed for breaking a channel through ice.
shortDefinitions: ship designed for breaking channel through ice

definitions: a thing that serves to relieve inhibitions or tension between people, or start a conversation.
shortDefinitions: thing that serves to relieve inhibitions or tension between people

definitions: a thing that breaks up moving ice so as to lessen its impact, especially a structure protecting the upstream end of a bridge pier.
shortDefinitions: thing that breaks up moving ice so as to lessen its impact
